newsitem.title: USA: Omaha Public 478 MW nuke seen at full this weekend.
newsitem.headline: Omaha Public 478 MW nuke seen at full this weekend.

text.p: Omaha Public Power District's 478 megawatt Fort Calhoun nuclear power plant in Fort Calhoun, Neb., will likely reach full power this weekend following a scheduled maintenance outage, a company spokesman said.
"It will probably be back at full this weekend," spokesman Gary Williams said Wednesday.
The unit was shut Oct 5 for scheduled refueling and maintenance and began ramping up power earlier this week.
According to the Nuclear Regulatory Commission's daily plant status report, Fort Calhoun was operating at near 18 percent of capacity early Wednesday.
